tha-ap238:1.1_0: They’re not frequented by ordinary people,
tha-ap238:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap238:2.2_0: fine and coarse, beautiful and ugly;
tha-ap238:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap238:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap238:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
tha-ap238:6.1_0: The sixth gems and the sixth.
